question:
A healthy person is often described as someone who has a good diet, gets plenty of exercise and avoids stress.
What should people do to stay healthy in your country?
text: Healthy person is generally known for his good diet, plenty of exercise and avoid stress. Not only the mentioned points need to be considered but also we should keep proper sleep also in mind. Let discuss regarding the same in following.

Let discuss in detail, regarding the food habits. Its plays an important role in our daily life. Not only consuming appropiate food but also at right time make us far from diseases. We have to make sure regarding food we consume doent have any ingredians which causes digestion problem. Apart from food we need to workout a regular intervals like walking, which helps us to have better digestive system functionality. Psychological pressure plays an important role in each and everyone life. It not only effect our work but also well being of the body. According to recent survey, person who is mentally strong and far from tension's tend to achieve more than others. In this situation, the best example is Arnold S. who have achieved world class reputation, with his physicall attire.

Comming to my country, I am from developing country, most of the people occupation will be either farming or industrial work. These sectors includes lot of physical work, so they tend to consume helathy food which is mixture of carbohydrates, fat and vitamins. So most of them usually use to fit and for the remaining they need to do some workouts in order to make them fit.
In Conclusion, Not only taking care of above discussed point but if we consider the proper sleep then life will be awesome by far from diseases.
